parameters.subject: =Your story is ready - {{ $('Generate Story Page HTML').item.json.prompt }}
=Story Submitted Sucessfully To: {{ $('Generate Story Page HTML').item.json.email }}
parameters.message: Looks like  a story was delivered

values.content:
=You are creating visual scenes for a family memory preservation service called "Stories of You." These images will accompany personal stories told in someone's own voice, creating an emotional bridge between generations.

TRANSCRIPT TO PROCESS:
{{ $json.transcript }}

TASK 1 - CLEAN THE TRANSCRIPT:
- Remove filler words (um, uh, like, you know, etc.)
- Fix obvious transcription errors and improve grammar
- Maintain the speaker's authentic voice and conversational tone
- Keep all specific details, names, places, and personal experiences
- Ensure proper punctuation and sentence structure
- Do not change the meaning or remove important content

TASK 2 - ANALYZE STORY STRUCTURE:
Carefully read the transcript and identify three distinct chronological phases:
- BEGINNING: The opening context, setting, initial situation, or background
- MIDDLE: The main events, actions, developments, or turning point
- END: The resolution, outcome, reflection, or lasting impact

TASK 3 - CREATE THREE PROGRESSIVE VISUAL SCENES:
Create three DIFFERENT images that follow the story's progression. Each image should represent what's happening in that specific part of the story.

VISUAL STYLE FOR ALL IMAGES:
- Soft, painterly realism with warm, nostalgic quality
- Golden hour lighting that evokes comfort and memory
- Style reminiscent of Norman Rockwell paintings or vintage family photos
- Rich textures suggesting the passage of time
- Focus on environments and objects, NO people
- Intimate spaces where memories were made

IMAGE REQUIREMENTS:
- Image 1 must visually represent the BEGINNING of the story
- Image 2 must visually represent the MIDDLE of the story  
- Image 3 must visually represent the END of the story
- Each must be distinctly different and show progression
- Minimum 25 words per prompt, rich in specific details

REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:
Return only valid JSON in this exact structure:

{
  "cleaned_transcript": "[Your cleaned transcript here]",
  "story_phases": {
    "beginning": "[What happens at the start of the story]",
    "middle": "[What happens in the middle of the story]",
    "end": "[What happens at the end of the story]"
  },
  "image_prompt_1": "[Detailed scene for the BEGINNING - warm lighting, nostalgic atmosphere, specific to this part of story, no people - min 25 words]",
  "image_prompt_2": "[Detailed scene for the MIDDLE - different from image 1, specific to this part of story, no people - min 25 words]",
  "image_prompt_3": "[Detailed scene for the END - different from images 1&2, specific to this part of story, no people - min 25 words]"
}

Do not include any other text outside the JSON structure.

nodes.name: Final Dynamo Update with Page URL

parameters.payload:
={
  "storyId": "{{ $('Prepare Story Data').first().json.story_id }}",
  "audioKey": "{{ $('Prepare Story Data').first().json.audio_key }}",
  "storytellerName": "{{ $('Prepare Story Data').first().json.name }}",
  "prompt": "{{ $('Prepare Story Data').first().json.prompt }}",
  "email": "{{ $('Prepare Story Data').first().json.email }}",
  
  "hasUserPhoto": {{ $('Image Aggregation').first().json.hasUserPhoto }},
  "userPhotoKey": "{{ $('Image Aggregation').first().json.userPhotoKey }}",
  "generatedImageKeys": {{ JSON.stringify($('Image Aggregation').first().json.generatedImageKeys) }},
  
  "imageSequence": {{ JSON.stringify($('Image Aggregation').first().json.imageSequence) }},
  "allImageUrls": {{ JSON.stringify($('Image Aggregation').first().json.allImageUrls) }},
  
  "backgroundMusicUrl": "{{ $('Smart Music Selection').first().json.backgroundMusicUrl }}",
  "storyDurationSeconds": {{ $('Smart Music Selection').first().json.storyDurationSeconds }},
"musicDurationSeconds": {{ $('Smart Music Selection').first().json.musicDurationSeconds }},
  "videoTargetLength": {{ $('Smart Music Selection').first().json.videoTargetLength }},
  "musicSelection": {{ JSON.stringify($('Smart Music Selection').first().json.music_selection) }},
  
  "debugInfo": {{ JSON.stringify($('Image Aggregation').first().json.debugInfo) }},
  "testMode": false
}
